definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Shoulder angle working face big mechanized mining captain Zhao-Bing told reporters.
sentences.chinese: 擔負大傾角工作面開採的綜採隊隊長孫兆冰告訴筆者。

sentences.english: With the flux augment, the pressure difference between pressure face and suctionface will minish.
sentences.chinese: 隨着流量增大，葉片工作面與壓力面的壓力差減小。

sentences.english: All coal was moved from the work face by electrically-driven conveyors.
sentences.chinese: 所有的煤都用電動傳送帶從工作面運出來。

sentences.english: The working surface of gravity paddy separators is a double tilt surface of reciprocating vibration.
sentences.chinese: 重力谷糙分離機的工作面是往復振動的雙向傾斜面。

sentences.english: The air current from forced ventilation is a wall-attached jet in the heading face.
sentences.chinese: 掘進工作面壓入式通風形成的風流是貼附射流。

sentences.english: These seals are primarily used for Longwall Roof Supports.
sentences.chinese: 生產的密封主要用於長壁工作面液壓支架上。

sentences.english: After the disintegration of the distribution valve, the main body was found face has scratches.
sentences.chinese: 後解體分配閥，發現主閥體工作面已擦傷。

sentences.english: The external load exerted on the support used in sub-level caving face generally moves forward.
sentences.chinese: 放頂煤工作面的支架外載荷普遍前移。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the method of slope adjustment of stope face.
sentences.chinese: 文章介紹了回採工作面的調斜方法。

sentences.english: This old coal face is to be reworked next week.
sentences.chinese: 這個舊的採煤工作面下週將重新開採。

sentences.english: Carry on dangerous appraisal of mine water leakage accident while regarding tunneling face as an example.
sentences.chinese: 以掘進工作面爲例，進行礦井透水事故危險性評價。

sentences.english: The roof of the working face caved in suddenly, several miners were trapped.
sentences.chinese: 工作面的頂板突然塌落，數名礦工被困在工作面內。

sentences.english: The roof of the working face caved in suddenly, several miners were trapped.
sentences.chinese: 工作面的頂板突然塌落，數名礦工被困在工作面內。

sentences.english: And they're bringing back the crew that made Race Face legit.
sentences.chinese: 而且他們帶回的船員，使得比賽工作面合法的。

definition: vertical shaft (for mining, ventilation systems etc)
stoping (excavating ore using stepped terraces)/to extract ore/extraction/to pull back
to bore a hole/to drill/drilled hole
roof/roof plate/rock layer forming roof of a cave or mine/abacus
